responsibilities: Develop and deploy machine learning solutions to enhance customer personalization, optimize monetization models, and improve lead quality.
Build scalable ML solutions that contribute to measurable improvements in company performance metrics.
Collaborate with Product, Engineering, Business Intelligence, and other teams to integrate ML models into various initiatives.
Identify and prioritize high-impact ML opportunities and lead their design, implementation, and deployment.
Mentor junior data scientists and contribute to the growth of the data science team.
Create containerized ML models using Docker/Kubernetes for efficiency, scalability, and ease of deployment.
qualifications: Experience with Data Science tools like Git, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Hands-on experience in cloud services like AWS or GCP.
Analytical excellence and ability to leverage ML models to drive performance metrics.
Curiosity and passion for learning the latest ML/AI trends and technologies.
Leadership skills to independently own projects and collaborate across teams.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on developing and deploying machine learning solutions for customer personalization, monetization models, and lead quality improvement. It involves building scalable ML solutions, integrating ML models into various initiatives, and mentoring junior data scientists. The skills required include proficiency in Python and SQL, experience with data science tools like Git, Docker, and Kubernetes, and hands-on experience with cloud services like AWS or GCP. There is a mention of curiosity and passion for learning the latest ML/AI trends and technologies.

However, there is no specific mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus seems to be on general machine learning solutions and their integration into business processes, rather than on developing or deploying GenAI or LLMs specifically.
